text:
You have an exciting idea.

I have the technical skills.

Let's launch it and get your first users.

P.S: I initially considered building my own thing. I chose Refined, after several people on Sage reached out looking for a dev partner.

cc @_buildspace @_nightsweekends https://t.co/63SotJwdgb
